author: Bloomberg
title: Virus in sewage? Dutch city finds a disturbing Covid data point
description: Virus in sewage? Dutch city finds a disturbing Covid data pointThe so-called SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus is often excreted in an infected person’s stool.
content:
By Jason GaleDutch scientists were able to find the coronavirus in a city’s wastewater before Covid-19 cases were reported, demonstrating a novel early warning system for the pneumonia-causing disease.
